nodes.text: The Alderaanian faction was a faction founded by Halle Dray. The group loathed the Organa Family. At one point the group captured Leia Organa as part of a plan to turn the princess in to the Empire, and in turn be rewarded with a new planet for Alderaanian refugees. However, the Imperials betrayed the faction, where most of the members of the faction was killed, and led the downfall of the faction.
